dialogue.speaker: Vincent
dialogue.text: Why do you ask?

dialogue.speaker: Rody
dialogue.text: Just curious. You must get lots of ladies?

dialogue.speaker: Vincent
dialogue.text: Sure.

dialogue.speaker: Vincent
dialogue.text: Look, I'm not sure what you're digging for here.

dialogue.text: Well, why are you here? You don't even cook. Financially stable. Why not relax and settle down?

dialogue.text: I don't run this place for money. I've got actual stake here. THIS is me settling down.

dialogue.speaker: Vincent
dialogue.text: Chasing petty romances isn't the end-all be-all in life.

dialogue.speaker: Vincent

dialogue.speaker: Rody
dialogue.text: Yeesh. Suit yourself.

dialogue.text: Booooo...

dialogue.text: Mm.

dialogue.speaker: Rody
dialogue.text: What?

dialogue.speaker: Vincent
dialogue.text: Nothing.

dialogue.speaker: Vincent
dialogue.text: I've dedicated my life to making this bistro as successful as it is now.

dialogue.speaker: Rody
dialogue.text: Yeah, but do you LIKE it?

dialogue.speaker: Vincent

dialogue.speaker: Rody

dialogue.speaker: Vincent
dialogue.text: ...What about you?

dialogue.speaker: Rody
dialogue.text: Me? I mean...it pays me money?

dialogue.speaker: Vincent

dialogue.speaker: Rody

dialogue.speaker: Vincent

dialogue.speaker: Rody

dialogue.speaker: Vincent
dialogue.text: You don't need to be too worried about that.

dialogue.speaker: Vincent
dialogue.text: It can't be any more embarrassing than you are now.

dialogue.text: Yeah, see, that kind of talk is exactly what I mean.

dialogue.text: ...Vince?

dialogue.text: —You better go home. You have work in the morning.

dialogue.speaker: Rody
dialogue.text: ...Right, my last day.

dialogue.speaker: Rody
dialogue.text: —Well, thanks for the party, I guess.

dialogue.speaker: Rody
dialogue.text: Good night, Vince.

dialogue.speaker: Vincent
dialogue.text: Night, Rody.

dialogue_full.speaker: Rody
dialogue_full.text: I quit. I uh—You said this was temporary, remember?

dialogue_full.speaker: Rody
dialogue_full.text: I know I'm supposed to give 2 weeks but you've been seeming pretty antsy lately so—

dialogue_full.speaker: Rody
dialogue_full.text: You probably want someone more qualified.

dialogue_full.speaker: Vincent
dialogue_full.text: ...Well, the position's still available if you need.

dialogue_full.speaker: Vincent
dialogue_full.text: You sounded fairly desperate when you first asked to work here.

dialogue_full.speaker: Rody
dialogue_full.text: Yeah, and now you don't need to worry about it anymore.

dialogue_full.speaker: Vincent
dialogue_full.text: ...Do you like the meal at least?

dialogue_full.speaker: Rody
dialogue_full.text: Oh!—I'll reheat the rest tonight for sure. It's pretty bitter though.

dialogue_full.speaker: Rody
dialogue_full.text: Hey, Manon!—I know you said we should take a break and all—

dialogue_full.speaker: Rody
dialogue_full.text: But I was thinking maybe we could get dinner somewhere?

dialogue_full.speaker: Rody
dialogue_full.text: Your choice! I wanted to say sorry and—

dialogue_full.speaker: AUTOMATED
dialogue_full.text: Your call could not be connected. Please try again later. Goodbye.

dialogue_full.speaker: Rody
dialogue_full.text: Hey, Manon? Hi, I tried calling earlier but I don't think you picked up.

dialogue_full.speaker: Rody
dialogue_full.text: I was wondering if you wanted to get dinner.

dialogue_full.speaker: Rody
dialogue_full.text: Super casual, but we could go anywhere you want. Money's no problem for me, so—

dialogue_full.speaker: AUTOMATED
dialogue_full.text: Your call could not be connected. Goodbye.

dialogue_full.speaker: AUTOMATED
dialogue_full.text: Your call could not be connected. Goodbye.

notes: ONLY ending where all major characters (Rody + Vincent) survive the week.
Manon's death is never confirmed to Rody.
Rody unknowingly ate Manon (grilled hanger steak = her remains).
Vincent's guilt compounds over time; ending is ambiguous/tragic.

dialogue_full.speaker: Rody
dialogue_full.text: ...Oh, right. I can just go to the restaurant after the party last night.

dialogue_full.speaker: Rody
dialogue_full.text: Vincent didn't exactly make it clear when I should come in...

dialogue_full.speaker: System
dialogue_full.text: Inside, I found a locket with a picture of me and Manon...splattered with blood.

dialogue_full.speaker: System
dialogue_full.text: And there was a meat grinder running beside it.

dialogue_full.speaker: System
dialogue_full.text: The meat...looked almost like an arm.

dialogue_full.speaker: Rody
dialogue_full.text: Vincent! Wh—Please! Get away from me! I—!

dialogue_full.speaker: Vincent
dialogue_full.text: You're ending up in the same place no matter what you do.

dialogue_full.speaker: Vincent
dialogue_full.text: But let me humor you for a moment.

dialogue_full.speaker: Vincent
dialogue_full.text: I'll give you 15 seconds. Try to escape while you're tied up.

dialogue_full.text: [No matter what Rody does, he cannot escape]

dialogue_full.text: You couldn't even be fast to save your own life.
